sentences.en: A diet extremely low in calories can also be a diet that is nutritionally unsound.
sentences.cn: 卡路里含量极低的饮食结构也会造成营养不良。

sentences.en: He escaped a prison sentence by reason of unsound mind at the time the crime was committed.
sentences.cn: 他以犯罪时精神不正常为由逃过了监禁刑罚.

sentences.en: I am afraid that it is an unsound investment.
sentences.cn: 我担心这项投资靠不住.

sentences.en: No sensible person would put his money in a bank he knew to be unsound.
sentences.cn: 凡是有头脑的人都不会把钱存到自己明知不可靠的银行里。

sentences.en: Rigid insistence on the legislative specification of detailed standards is thought to be unsound and unworkable.
sentences.cn: 僵硬地坚持对详尽的标准要有立法说明,这一主张被认为是不合理和不切实际的.

sentences.en: That bridge looks unsound to me.

sentences.cn: 那个教堂的结构很不坚固。

sentences.en: The findings of the research seem unsound.
The house roof was ( structurally ) unsound.
sentences.cn: 这屋顶 ( 结构 ) 不牢固.

sentences.en: The national tests were educationally unsound.
sentences.cn: 从教育角度看，全国统考是不合理的。

sentences.en: The thinking is good-hearted, but muddled and fundamentally unsound.
sentences.cn: 这个想法的出发点是好的，但是条理混乱，而且本质上是错误的。

sentences.en: This is prudent finance, not unsound finance.
sentences.cn: 这是谨慎的理财方法, 而不是不健全的理财方法.

trans.tran_cn: 不健全的，不稳固的，无根据的，腐烂的
trans.tran_en: not based on facts or good reasons
